body_html: I would only keep one name field, and make sure all the names are unique. Two fields increases unnecessary complexity. If the name conflicts, raise the exception, the name is for debugging purpose. So the chance to get the conflicts should be pretty low.

body: I would only keep one name field, and make sure all the names are unique. Two fields increases unnecessary complexity. If the name conflicts, raise the exception, the name is for debugging purpose. So the chance to get the conflicts should be pretty low.
